title: Bothered by People Talking in the Third Person? (minicast) - 13. Aug. 2009
description:
Does it bug you when people talk about themselves in the third person? A caller finds herself mightily annoyed by this habit, which she observes especially among politicians and celebrities. There's a word for the practice of referring to oneself in the third person: illeism.  --  Get your language question answered on the air!
